Author: m2medici
Text: When I'm at that point,  I'll Restrict more,I'll  excersize more. And half water intake.  Even if I got to take a water pill. I wont lose my progress.

Author: snugglejuice
Text: ME. I ate a Proper Meal™️ fucking last TUESDAY and I can’t stop thinking of how much lower I’d be right now if I hadn’t. That decrease in weight loss rate stares at me in the face every day and I just think... I’d be at X weight right now if this day hadn’t existed. Ugh. That was almost a week ago, brain fucking move on already.
